document_title: What is hair loss? 15 Common causes and signs
subsection_name: rung-toc.json_3_What risk factors increase the likelihood of hair loss?
subsection_content:
Factors that can increase the risk of hair loss include: (4)
Family history of baldness; Age.; Losing weight.; People with diabetes and lupus.; Stress, tension; Nutritional deficiencies.
Most of the time, lost hair will grow back, however, some factors can hinder the hair growth process.
